forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered snow showers. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 26. West northwest wind 13 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered snow showers. Mostly sunny. High near 34, with temperatures falling to around 32 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 12 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Snow Showers then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers before 8pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 20. West wind 2 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Light Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow after 1pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 34. South southwest wind 2 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: We are going to open the Lodge, General Store, Tune Center, Cafeteria and Pub on Black Friday and Small Business Saturday. Doors will be open from 9:00 â€“ 4:00 both days, with the Michigan-Ohio State game on in the pub. Early season tuning specials run through November 29. Get your skis and boards in soon! The General Store also has many great gift ideas for the skier on your list.
